column5: row identifier (hidden attribute; must be explicitly selected
collation name (unique per namespace and encoding
the oid of the namespace that contains this collatio
provider of the collation: d = database default, c = libc, i = ic
encoding in which the collation is applicable, or -1 if it works for any encodin

provider-specific version of the collation. this is recorded when the collation is created and then checked when it is used, to detect changes in the collation definition that could lead to data corruption
